ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityAssociation
registro = widget.Entity if registro == None:return
parcela = registro.Fields["PARCELA"] if parcela == None or parcela.Handle.IsInvalid(): return
remessa = parcela.Instance.Fields["REMESSA"] if (remessa == None or remessa.Handle.IsInvalid()): widget.View.FieldDefinitions["MOTIVOBORDERO"].Visible = False
